snippet.title: Once upon a Dungeon - Trailer
snippet.description: Once upon a Dungeon is a roguelike game with dense atmosphere and challenging gameplay. Explore dark dungeons full of dreadful foes. Defeat them using physical power or mighty spells. Collect unique items, enhance your attributes and face the main antagonist - Fallen One. Soon on steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/772090/Once_upon_a_Dungeon/
